data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Borgo Maggiore, San Marino will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Borgo Maggiore, San Marino
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Borgo Maggiore, San Marino.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Borgo Maggiore, San Marino so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Borgo Maggiore.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Borgo Maggiore who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Borgo Maggiore unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, move the 5 believers in the state of Borgo Maggiore to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary:
the state of Borgo Maggiore, San Marino has a population of 7,000.

We estimate Borgo Maggiore has 5 people who might know Jesus, 5,889 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,106 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,399 neighbors who need Jesus.
